Name:
Esso Trenton
USS Sangamon
Builder: Federal Shipbuilding and Dry Dock Company, Kearny, New Jersey
Fate:
Purchased by the US Navy
Sold, 11 February 1948, Scrapped in Osaka, Japan, August 1960
Reclassified:
AVG-26, 14 February 1942

ACV-26, 20 August 1942
CVE-26, 15 July 1943
Displacement: 11,400 long tons (11,600 t) standard, 24,275 long tons (24,665 t) full
Armament:
2 × 127mm/51 cal guns (2×1)
8 × 40 mm anti-aircraft guns (4×2)
12 × 20 mm anti-aircraft cannons (12×1)
Awards: 8 battle stars. Her three air groups were each awarded the Presidential Unit Citation
